title.rendered: The Bone Cave: If Women Rose Rooted

content.rendered:
[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Hero Section” _builder_version=”4.16″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_direction=”116deg” background_color_gradient_stops=”#282723 0%|rgba(0,0,0,0) 74%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#282723″ background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” background_color_gradient_end_position=”74%” background_image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/IWRR-header.jpg” custom_padding=”10%||10%||false|false” saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row admin_label=”Hero Area” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”46px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”|||on|||||” header_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_font_size=”79px” header_line_height=”1.2em” header_2_font=”||||||||” header_2_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font_size=”64px” header_2_letter_spacing=”2px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” background_layout=”dark” animation_style=”fade” header_font_size_tablet=”” header_font_size_phone=”40px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

IF WOMEN ROSE ROOTED: RECLAIMING THE MYTHIC FEMININE

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_text_color=”#d9c2a3″ header_2_text_color=”#d9c2a3″ header_2_font_size=”33px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” header_3_text_color=”#d9c2a3″ header_4_text_color=”#d9c2a3″ header_2_font_size_tablet=”29px” header_2_font_size_phone=”24px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

An online gathering in the Bone Cave

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#282723″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ text_font_size=”26px” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_text_color=”#d9c2a3″ header_2_line_height=”1.3em” header_3_font=”||||||||” header_3_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_4_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” text_font_size_tablet=”22px” text_font_size_phone=”” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” z_index_tablet=”500″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Saturday December 12, 2020

16.00 – 17.30 UK time

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#282723″ custom_padding=”2px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_padding=”53px|||||” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Raleway|300||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#fed593″ header_2_font_size=”30px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

An online gathering 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” z_index_tablet=”500″ text_text_align=”left” global_colors_info=”{}”]

I’m delighted to offer you the chance to view my first event in the Bone Cave: a free live webinar based on my book, If Women Rose Rooted. This event took place on December 12, 2020, but you can watch the recording below. I talk about the process of writing the book, how the inspiration came about, but most of all, how my ideas on reclaiming the mythic feminine have progressed in the intervening years. There was also a chance for participants to ‘ask me anything’ about any issue related to the book.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#893e39″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#44393d” custom_padding=”||36px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.16″ min_height=”326px” custom_padding=”4px||0px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”30px||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”10px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Raleway|300||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#fed593″ header_2_font_size=”30px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” custom_padding=”22px||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

free gift

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” header_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”Raleway|300|||||||” header_3_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_3_font_size=”28px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”||-21px|||” z_index_tablet=”500″ text_text_align=”left” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The winner of the free gift offered to those who attended the live event was Victoria John, from London.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#282723″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#282723″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_cta title=”Find out about other events in The Bone Cave” button_url=”https://sharonblackie.net/the-bone-cave-online-retreats/” button_text=”VISIT THE BONE CAVE” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” header_text_color=”#ffb69e” body_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ background_color=”#282723″ link_option_url=”https://sharonblackie.net/the-bone-cave-online-retreats/” global_colors_info=”{}”]

 

Click on the button to browse forthcoming events.

[/et_pb_cta][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Workshops and Events Section” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”0px||0px|” saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”0″ make_equal=”on” admin_label=”About Area” _builder_version=”4.17.4″ background_color=”#44393d” width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_margin=”0px||0px” custom_padding=”0px||0px|” use_custom_width=”on” width_unit=”off” custom_width_percent=”100%” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_enable_color=”off” background_image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/wolves-left-OPT.jpg” custom_padding=”7%|5%|7%|5%|true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”33%||33%||true|false” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.17.4″ background_color=”#44393d” background_enable_image=”off” custom_padding=”5%|5%|5%|5%|true” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font=”|300||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font_size=”34px” custom_padding_tablet=”10px||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

JOIN MY PACK

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#c34d49″ divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”50px” custom_padding=”20px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.4″ text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font=”|300||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font_size=”34px” custom_margin=”||41px|||” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

Subscribe to my free monthly newsletter on Substack, and be among the first to hear all the latest news about my books, courses and events – as well as personal seasonal reflections and reading recommendations. You’ll also receive signed book and course giveaways that are exclusively for subscribers, and a special gift as a thank you for joining me!

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://sharonblackie.substack.com” url_new_window=”on” button_text=”JOIN MY LIST” _builder_version=”4.17.4″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”18px” button_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ button_bg_color=”#c34d49″ button_border_width=”4px” button_border_color=”#c34d49″ button_border_radius=”100px” button_font=”|300||on|||||” button_use_icon=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

excerpt.rendered: A free live webinar based on Sharon Blackie’s book, If Women Rose Rooted. Sharon talks about the process of writing it, how the inspiration came about, but most of all, how her ideas on reclaiming the mythic feminine have progressed in the intervening years.
